semantic_identifier: [GOLD-78]: Instrument analytics for stale/manual positioning block usage and replacement actions
title: Instrument analytics for stale/manual positioning block usage and replacement actions

sections.text: Add product analytics/telemetry for the stale-block detection flow so we can quantify how often users paste or keep outdated Customer_Analyzer positioning blocks. Emit events for: block edited/pasted, staleness check result, warning shown, and user action (kept vs replaced), including account/opportunity ID and canonical CA version/timestamp. Validate events end-to-end in staging and document the schema for downstream reporting.
